The Seers are a collective of psychics whose purpose is to scan the minds of the populace to discover potential criminal thoughts. Thought crime does not carry a harsh penalty in Praetoria, however. Those found guilty are merely subjected to resocialization and reeducation regimens that correct the mental imbalances that are the source of such criminal behavior. In addition, the elites among the Seers accompany the Imperial Defense Force in combat.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Praetoria [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least 6 B.A.F.s [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Land Units gain the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Seer Vision[ENDCOLOR] Promotion, granting them +1 Sight and +15% Defense vs. Ranged Attacks.
